text: "All Right" is a 1983 song by Christopher Cross and is the leading single from his second studio album Another Page. It went to number 12 in the United States, number 51 in the United Kingdom, number 13 in Italy and Canada, number 44 in New Zealand, number 5 in Switzerland and Norway, number 4 in Sweden, number 16 in the Netherlands and number 14 in Ireland. == Track listing == # All Right 4:01 # Long World 3:32 ==References== Category:1983 songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:Christopher Cross songs
title: All Right
